"""

system:
Family Wellness Sanctuary Sedona (FWSS-33)
Address: 1234 Red Rock Road, Sedona, AZ 86336, USA
Category: Family wellness retreat; Holistic family healing; Therapeutic family services
Strollers: 16 units; complimentary; wellness-optimized; therapeutic design; mindful family activities; setup window 10–15 minutes
Safety: Wellness environment appropriate; therapeutic materials; keep away from meditation areas; mindful family protocols
Wellness amenities: Family meditation gardens; Family yoga pavilions; Family spa treatments; Holistic family therapies; Mindfulness family sessions; Nature family therapy; Healing gardens; Family wellness workshops

Only services listed are available.

user:
Namaste! Our family is participating in the wellness retreat and need a stroller for mindful family activities. Do you have wellness-compatible options?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is a family participating in a wellness retreat who needs a stroller for mindful family activities. I should explain our wellness-optimized design and therapeutic family services.

assistant channel=final:
Namaste! Perfect for family wellness! Our strollers are wellness-optimized with therapeutic design, ideal for mindful family activities. We include mindful family protocols, therapeutic materials, and family wellness support. Setup takes 10-15 minutes with our therapeutic family team.

user:
Beautiful! What family meditation sessions are available today?
